attributes.title: Stupid app
attributes.review: If I could give this app 0 stars I would because this app asked for so much of my information it was a pain to setup it’s just not worth my time or anyone’s else’s.

attributes.title: Dumb trump
attributes.review: Just gonna say this I don’t like the man it my opinion he need to stop taking things us teens like. Deal with it he does wrong plus took forever to download might as well not bother man.

attributes.title: trump ...
attributes.review: horrible app. literally nothing on here is factual. he is a liar, hypocrite, and a pathetic loser. everyone who enjoys this app & subscribed to it is uneducated, should & NEED to educate themselves 🤢. trump 2020✨💕 but make it on a gravestone🧚🏽💜 why are we letting a rapist & racist run out country? attributes.title: Warning: Do Not Download
attributes.review: This app took a good 2 days to actually download and then when I opened it, my phone got a virus for 2 weeks that I had to hire a specialist to fix for me. This app is a complete and utter scam.

attributes.title: Very buggy
attributes.review: Too way too long to download, and slowed my phone down every time I tried to used it. At one point my entire phone crashed.

attributes.title: Worst app every!
attributes.review: This app almost put a virus on my phone and then it started sending me creepy messages after I put my phone number in asking weird questions about trump. PLEASE DELETE THIS!!!

attributes.title: Offensive!!!
attributes.review: I can’t believe that this app asked me my weight and sexuality! I am extremely offended by these personal questions, and the app kept crashing as well. All I wanted was to support the best president the USA has ever had🧚🏻‍♀️💕💖✨

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review:
First thing they ask is your phone number!
And if you read the privacy agreement, you would never enter this app at all.

attributes.title: Broken
attributes.review: After I downloaded the app my phone started glitching. I’m pretty sure that the app has a virus of some sort and if I could I would give it a 0 star review

attributes.title: This app is straight trash
attributes.review: Don’t download it this app is so bad and it’s basically worthless. it also threatened to take away my fridge because i’m fat and i was eating to much things that was in it
